Name: vm_custom_icons
Overview:
Downloads and installs additional custom VM icons to the Unraid VM Manager.

After install Container should be set to auto start.

Usage

Basic settings
1. Choose which custom icons you want to be installed from the drop downs.
2. Choose wether you want to keep the existing stock vm icons (recommended to keep)
3. Set wether all icons are redownloaded when container starts.
    Setting this as yes will clear all vm icons then redownload all choosen icons from github repo. 
    Setting to yes will on every start download any new icons in selected sections.
    (This is also useful if you deceide you no longer want a choosen section of icons anymore)
4. If your server has a beep speaker you can enable a tune to be played each time icons are synced!

Advanced settings (under show more settings)
1. You can set how long the container should wait before exiting after syncing icons (default 30 seconds)
Other options dont change
DonateText: If you like my work then please buy me a beer! :)

@attributes.Name: windows icons
@attributes.Description: select yes or no to download windows vm icons

@attributes.Name: linux icons
@attributes.Description: select yes or no to download linux vm icons

@attributes.Name: freebsd icons
@attributes.Description: select yes or no to download freebsd vm icons

@attributes.Name: macos vm icons
@attributes.Description: select yes or no to download macos vm icons

@attributes.Name: other os  icons
@attributes.Description: select yes or no to download other vm icons

@attributes.Name: Keep Stock VM Icons
@attributes.Description: set to no to remove stock unraid vm icons

@attributes.Name: Clear all icons & redownload above on each start
@attributes.Description: set to yes to delete all vm icons. and redownload the above from github on every run of container

@attributes.Name: Enable sucess tune on icon load
@attributes.Description: Enable tune on sucess. (you must have a beep speaker)

@attributes.Name: Time to wait before exit
@attributes.Description: Time to wait before stopping container after syncing icons

@attributes.Name: vm manager icon location
@attributes.Description: location on server where Unraid stores vm icons (dont change this)
